mutants.code:
def reverse_sentence(sentence):
    reversed_words = []
    start = 1
    end = 0
    for i in range(len(sentence)):
        if sentence[i] == ' ':
            word = sentence[start:end][::-1]
            reversed_words.append(word)
            start = i + 1
            end = i + 1
        else:
            end += 1
    word = sentence[start:end][::-1]
    reversed_words.append(word)
    reversed_sentence = ' '.join(reversed_words[::-1])
    return reversed_sentence
